title: i got the icons but do i get the borders later?
body: ok so i got all the icon but only ekko i dont feel and dont have the money to get the kat and ashe skins but i got all 3 icon do i still get the borders later with i dont get them now?

replies.body:
Unlocking icons from the Decrupter, Hyper Edge, and EM Caster caches do not unlocked the First Strike Border.  It's still necessary to use the project cores on the First Strike blueprints that comes with those chests.  

The First Strike blueprint will unlock a special icon as well, but it's not necessary to have it equipped to load the first strike border.  We also have additional information available in our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  

Let me know if you have any questions!
thank you for the reply it means a lot but if i dont own the ashe skin and kat can i buy them later past aug 16 to still have the borders

You'll have to craft the borders individually using blueprints and cores from the caches. You can get more specific info about it here; http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down
